welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Oak Lawn, the charming city known for its historic landmarks, friendly locals, and delicious cuisine. We invite you to explore and immerse yourselves in all that our beautiful city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Midway Airport serves as the primary hub for all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A is the largest concourse at Midway Airport, housing a variety of airlines and amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B is a smaller concourse at Midway Airport, primarily used for regional flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may have limited speeds and connectivity.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: Main terminal for domestic and international flights

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: Terminal for regional and commuter flights

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lewis Lockport Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Lewis Lockport Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: Serves domestic and international flights for United Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Serves domestic and international flights for Delta Air Lines and Air Canada.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: Serves domestic and international flights for American Airlines, Alaska Airlines, and others.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: Serves international flights for various airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pal-Waukee Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Pal-Waukee Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Dupage County Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Dupage County Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
